name: Mic n Ike

screenshots.caption: First look at the title screen

short_description: Mic n Ike is a 2D side-scrolling platformer about Mic, a courageous little microwave who sets out to save his beloved master Ike from the tyrannical Robot Horde.
summary: A 2D platformer game about a courageous microwave
